body.p: Using simple principles of probability, find the probability of each of the outcomes listed in the previous question.

explanation.p: P(GB) = 1/2 * 1/2 = 1/4 (using the multiplication principle for independent events)
P(GGB) = 1/2 * 1/2 * 1/2 = 1/8 (using the multiplication principle for independent events)
P(GGG) = 1/2 * 1/2 * 1/2 = 1/8 (using the multiplication principle for independent events)
